alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 8:11PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Towaliga River near Juliette affecting Monroe County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Towaliga River near Juliette. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Minor flooding of woodlands in the natural flood plain begins along the river. Low lying areas of Byars Road...downstream and right bank from the gage on Monticello Highway or Georgia Highway 83 will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM EDT Thursday was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 16 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
